news.markdown:
**A brilliant 2017 so far..**
We have had a wonderful and very busy first half of the 2017 so far. In January 2017, receiving our fourth Arts Council Grant for the Arts to support development of our new show**_ "It's okay, I'm dealing with it._"** and for further touring of **_May-We-Go-Round?_** The work is now newly developed and was performed to sell out audiences in Brighton Festival 2017, in a double bill of May-We-Go-Round? May-We-Go-Round was performed at mac Birmingham, The Place London and The Courtyard in Hereford. 

We are delighted to continue touring both shows into Autumn 2017. Come find us on the road!
news.html:
A brilliant 2017 so far..
We have had a wonderful and very busy first half of the 2017 so far. In January 2017, receiving our fourth Arts Council Grant for the Arts to support development of our new show “It’s okay, I’m dealing with it.“ and for further touring of May-We-Go-Round? The work is now newly developed and was performed to sell out audiences in Brighton Festival 2017, in a double bill of May-We-Go-Round? May-We-Go-Round was performed at mac Birmingham, The Place London and The Courtyard in Hereford.

We are delighted to continue touring both shows into Autumn 2017. Come find us on the road!

events.markdown:
**_May-We-Go-Round?_ Autumn Performances**
**22nd September** -- Swindon Dance -- **[Tickets](http://www.swindondance.org.uk/event/the-hiccup-project-may-we-go-round/)**
**23rd September** - Merlin Theatre, Frome -- **[Tickets](http://www.merlintheatre.co.uk/whats-on/performances/?page=2)**

**_"It's okay, I'm dealing with it._" Autumn Tour**
**15-16th November** --- The Wardrobe Theatre, Bristol --- **[Tickets](http://thewardrobetheatre.com/livetheatre/okay-im-dealing/)**
**17th November** -- Bath Spa Live, Bath Spa University  -- ** [Tickets](https://www.bathspalive.com/Online/default.asp)**
**18-19 November** -- Camden People's Theatre -- ** [Tickets](https://www.cptheatre.co.uk/production/its-okay-im-dealing-with-it/)**

There will also be an Open Level workshop at The Wardrobe Theatre on 15th November - **[Tickets](http://thewardrobetheatre.com/livetheatre/workshop-hiccup-project/)**
